title: Duplex for Rent! Available today!
posting_body: Nice 2 bedroom duplex unit for rent
Parking: Single Garage with 2 cars in driveway
2 bedroom, 1 bath duplex with garage for rent !
UPDATED kitchen cabinets, new floors, freshly painted with new bathroom vanity.
Good layout and a nice spacious garage.
Sliding glass door to the back yard with a private fenced patio.
Land lord will take care of lawn!
$1500 deposit; Deposit is due within 3 days of application acceptance.
Garbage and sewer included in rent!
Lessee pays Parkland Light and Water.
-12 months of consecutive employment or 6 months in a similar job
-Provide rental references from 2 previous landlords(if applicable)
-Each resident over 18 yrs old must pass a criminal/credit background check
-NO outstanding money owed to a landlord or property management company
-Proper notice given to current or previous landlords
Please send us your questions with a good contact phone number and a little about yourself and we'll get back to you shortly!
